Predicty.Option","name":"winningOption","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"settleTime","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"totalPool","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"oracle","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"owner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address Predicty.Option","name":"_option","type":"uint8"}],"name":"placeBet","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"resumeMarketCreation","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"settleMarket","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_oracle","type":"address"}],"name":"updateOracleAddress","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_marketId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawCreationReward","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_marketId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawSettlementReward","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_marketId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawWinnings","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"stateMutability":"payable","type":"receive"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"calculateWinnings(uint256,address)":{"details":"Calculates the winnings for a specific user in the prediction market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.","_user":"The specific user address for which this function is called."},"returns":{"winnings":"Returns the total amount that has been won by a specific user address in the prediction market."}},"constructor":{"details":"Deploys the smart contract and fires up the first prediction market.","params":{"_duration":"Sets the duration of the prediction market cycles, i.e. duration = 1 hours will make sure that all prediction markets started by this smart contract will be Live for 1 hour and subsequently be InSetllement for 1 hour.","_oracle":"Sets the address of the oracle used used as pricefeed. Rinkeby ETH/USD price oracle = 0x8A753747A1Fa494EC906cE90E9f37563A8AF630e."}},"createNewMarket()":{"details":"Creates a new prediction market (after the previous one was settled), by calling the configured pricefeed oracle and incentivising the user address address for calling this function.","returns":{"success":"Returns whether the market creation was successful."}},"destroy()":{"details":"Destroys the smart contract instance and sends all remaining Ether stored in the smart contract to the owner address."},"getContractBalance()":{"details":"Gets the current balance of the smart contract.","returns":{"balance":"Returns the current balance of the smart contract."}},"getLatestPrice()":{"details":"Gets the latest/current asset price (e.g. ETH/USD) from the configured pricefeed oracle.","returns":{"latestPrice":"Returns the latest/current asset price (e.g. ETH/USD) from the configured pricefeed oracle."}},"getMarketExpireTime(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the prediction market expire timestamp (as seconds since unix epoch). After the expiry of the prediction market users can no longer place bets.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."},"returns":{"expireTime":"Returns the expire time of the prediction market."}},"getMarketSettleTime(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the prediction market settlement timestamp (as seconds since unix epoch). As of the settlement timestamp, the pricefeed oracle can be called to settle the prediction market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."},"returns":{"settleTime":"Returns the settlement time of the prediction market."}},"getMarketStartTime(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the prediction market start timestamp (as seconds since unix epoch).","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."},"returns":{"startTime":"Returns the start time of the prediction market."}},"getMarketStatus(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the status of the prediction market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."},"returns":{"status":"Returns the updated status of the prediction market."}},"getMarketTotalBets(uint256,uint8)":{"details":"Gets the total amount that has been staked on a specific bet option in the prediction market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.","_option":"The specific bet option for which this function is called, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish."},"returns":{"totalBets":"Returns the total amount that has been staked on a specific bet option in the prediction market."}},"getMarketTotalPool(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the total amount that has been staked on all bet options together in the prediction market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."},"returns":{"totalPool":"Returns the total amount that has been staked on all bet options together in the prediction market."}},"getNeutralMaxValue(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the prediction market neutral maximum price value. The neutral maximum price value forms the upper bound of the Neutral betting option.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."},"returns":{"maxValue":"Returns the neutral maximum price value of the prediction market."}},"getNeutralMinValue(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the prediction market neutral minimum price value. The neutral minimum price value forms the lower bound of the Neutral betting option.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."},"returns":{"minValue":"Returns the neutral minimum price value of the prediction market."}},"getSettlementPrice(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the historical asset price (e.g. ETH/USD) at prediction market settlement time from the configured pricefeed oracle.","params":{"_settleTime":"The prediction market settlement timestamp, for which an historical asset price should be returned."},"returns":{"roundId":"Returns the matching roundId from the configured pricefeed oracle, for the historical asset price.","settlementPrice":"Returns the historical asset price (e.g. ETH/USD) at prediction market settlement time from the configured pricefeed oracle."}},"getUserAmountStaked(uint256,address,uint8)":{"details":"Gets the total amount that has been staked by a specific user address on a specific bet option in the prediction market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.","_option":"The specific bet option for which this function is called, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish.","_user":"The specific user address for which this function is called."},"returns":{"amountStaked":"Returns the total amount that has been staked by a specific user address on a specific bet option in the prediction market."}},"getUserClaimedCreationReward(uint256,address)":{"details":"Gets a boolean value returning whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her reward for creating the predition market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.","_user":"The specific user address for which this function is called."},"returns":{"claimed":"Returns whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her reward for creating the predition market."}},"getUserClaimedSettlementReward(uint256,address)":{"details":"Gets a boolean value returning whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her reward for settling the predition market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.","_user":"The specific user address for which this function is called."},"returns":{"claimed":"Returns whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her reward for settling the predition market."}},"getUserClaimedWinnings(uint256,address)":{"details":"Gets a boolean value returning whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her winnings in the predition market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.","_user":"The specific user address for which this function is called."},"returns":{"claimed":"Returns whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her winnings in the predition market."}},"getUserCreationReward(uint256,address)":{"details":"Gets the reward amount that has been awarded to a specific user address for creating the prediction market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.","_user":"The specific user address for which this function is called."},"returns":{"reward":"Returns the reward amount that has been awarded to a specific user address for creating the prediction market."}},"getUserSettlementReward(uint256,address)":{"details":"Gets the reward amount that has been awarded to a specific user address for settling the prediction market.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.","_user":"The specific user address for which this function is called."},"returns":{"reward":"Returns the reward amount that has been awarded to a specific user address for settling the prediction market."}},"getWinningOption(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the winning option after prediction market settlement.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."},"returns":{"winner":"Returns the winning option, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish."}},"pauseMarketCreation()":{"details":"Updates the flag to pause market creation, in case of issues."},"placeBet(uint8)":{"details":"Places a bet amount on a specific bet option in the prediction market that is currently Live.","params":{"_option":"The specific bet option for which this function is called, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish."}},"resumeMarketCreation()":{"details":"Updates the flag to resume market creation, when issues are solved."},"settleMarket()":{"details":"Settles the prediction market that is currently InSettlement, by calling the configured pricefeed oracle and incentivising the user address address for calling this function."},"updateOracleAddress(address)":{"details":"Updates the address of the pricefeed oracle (e.g. the ChainLink ETH/USD pricefeed oracle).","params":{"_oracle":"The new address of the pricefeed oracle."}},"withdrawCreationReward(uint256)":{"details":"Allows the calling user address to withdraw his/her creation reward in the prediction market, after settlement.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."}},"withdrawSettlementReward(uint256)":{"details":"Allows the calling user address to withdraw his/her settlement reward in the prediction market, after settlement.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."}},"withdrawWinnings(uint256)":{"details":"Allows the calling user address to withdraw his/her winnings in the prediction market, after settlement.","params":{"_marketId":"The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called."}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/koen/iteration01/predicty/contracts/Predicty.sol":"Predicty"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/home/koen/iteration01/predicty/contracts/Predicty.sol":{"keccak256":"0x483ffa731b460b433b12f1dab683ae0a32a7efa5a6b6aaaf36979f2f1fc4e98e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://91d154f8850852ac5b34a97dca3bad160aac239c9012da16b26b4e794dce8eed","dweb:/ipfs/QmUDoYMPc3NJnYYimz48FDnpLsAvFGHeuTpk6K9hHJ4pBv"]},"/home/koen/iteration01/predicty/contracts/external/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0xba96bc371ba999f452985a98717cca1e4c4abb598dc038a9a9c3db08129b1ba4","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://26e50e3f7b6482fb6f598f2e006994a74aa492687daa4b3eee7fd4fb5398ce7f","dweb:/ipfs/QmZudqoPSkA4USLMFsBBmt19dDPZFS8aaAmL5R7pECXu6t"]},"/home/koen/iteration01/predicty/contracts/interfaces/AggregatorV3Interface.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1862840d741dedb36e774534b877a13b5187555e3b78b8d2815f898b0dc02268","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://64a15f4349aea6e60703f581a6280b71d6adb35ee74d2f3c4f130a2adc3efee3","dweb:/ipfs/QmdVoSQvGfJNPnjQsAs7ZN3ueWghzTa72jSqzhGiQNDpkL"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text:
@dev Places a bet amount on a specific bet option in the prediction market that is currently Live.
 @param _option The specific bet option for which this function is called, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish.
@dev Settles the prediction market that is currently InSettlement, by calling the configured pricefeed oracle and incentivising the user address address for calling this function.

calculateWinnings(uint256,address).details: Calculates the winnings for a specific user in the prediction market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
params._user: The specific user address for which this function is called.

returns.winnings: Returns the total amount that has been won by a specific user address in the prediction market.

constructor.details: Deploys the smart contract and fires up the first prediction market.

params._duration: Sets the duration of the prediction market cycles, i.e. duration = 1 hours will make sure that all prediction markets started by this smart contract will be Live for 1 hour and subsequently be InSetllement for 1 hour.
params._oracle: Sets the address of the oracle used used as pricefeed. Rinkeby ETH/USD price oracle = 0x8A753747A1Fa494EC906cE90E9f37563A8AF630e.

createNewMarket().details: Creates a new prediction market (after the previous one was settled), by calling the configured pricefeed oracle and incentivising the user address address for calling this function.

returns.success: Returns whether the market creation was successful.

destroy().details: Destroys the smart contract instance and sends all remaining Ether stored in the smart contract to the owner address.

getContractBalance().details: Gets the current balance of the smart contract.

returns.balance: Returns the current balance of the smart contract.

getLatestPrice().details: Gets the latest/current asset price (e.g. ETH/USD) from the configured pricefeed oracle.

returns.latestPrice: Returns the latest/current asset price (e.g. ETH/USD) from the configured pricefeed oracle.

getMarketExpireTime(uint256).details: Gets the prediction market expire timestamp (as seconds since unix epoch). After the expiry of the prediction market users can no longer place bets.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

returns.expireTime: Returns the expire time of the prediction market.

getMarketSettleTime(uint256).details: Gets the prediction market settlement timestamp (as seconds since unix epoch). As of the settlement timestamp, the pricefeed oracle can be called to settle the prediction market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

returns.settleTime: Returns the settlement time of the prediction market.

getMarketStartTime(uint256).details: Gets the prediction market start timestamp (as seconds since unix epoch).

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

returns.startTime: Returns the start time of the prediction market.

getMarketStatus(uint256).details: Gets the status of the prediction market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

returns.status: Returns the updated status of the prediction market.

getMarketTotalBets(uint256,uint8).details: Gets the total amount that has been staked on a specific bet option in the prediction market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
params._option: The specific bet option for which this function is called, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish.

returns.totalBets: Returns the total amount that has been staked on a specific bet option in the prediction market.

getMarketTotalPool(uint256).details: Gets the total amount that has been staked on all bet options together in the prediction market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

returns.totalPool: Returns the total amount that has been staked on all bet options together in the prediction market.

getNeutralMaxValue(uint256).details: Gets the prediction market neutral maximum price value. The neutral maximum price value forms the upper bound of the Neutral betting option.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

returns.maxValue: Returns the neutral maximum price value of the prediction market.

getNeutralMinValue(uint256).details: Gets the prediction market neutral minimum price value. The neutral minimum price value forms the lower bound of the Neutral betting option.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

returns.minValue: Returns the neutral minimum price value of the prediction market.

getSettlementPrice(uint256).details: Gets the historical asset price (e.g. ETH/USD) at prediction market settlement time from the configured pricefeed oracle.

params._settleTime: The prediction market settlement timestamp, for which an historical asset price should be returned.

returns.roundId: Returns the matching roundId from the configured pricefeed oracle, for the historical asset price.
returns.settlementPrice: Returns the historical asset price (e.g. ETH/USD) at prediction market settlement time from the configured pricefeed oracle.

getUserAmountStaked(uint256,address,uint.details: Gets the total amount that has been staked by a specific user address on a specific bet option in the prediction market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
params._option: The specific bet option for which this function is called, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish.
params._user: The specific user address for which this function is called.

returns.amountStaked: Returns the total amount that has been staked by a specific user address on a specific bet option in the prediction market.

getUserClaimedCreationReward(uint256,add.details: Gets a boolean value returning whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her reward for creating the predition market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
params._user: The specific user address for which this function is called.

returns.claimed: Returns whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her reward for creating the predition market.

getUserClaimedSettlementReward(uint256,a.details: Gets a boolean value returning whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her reward for settling the predition market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
params._user: The specific user address for which this function is called.

returns.claimed: Returns whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her reward for settling the predition market.

getUserClaimedWinnings(uint256,address).details: Gets a boolean value returning whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her winnings in the predition market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
params._user: The specific user address for which this function is called.

returns.claimed: Returns whether a specific user address has already claimed his/her winnings in the predition market.

getUserCreationReward(uint256,address).details: Gets the reward amount that has been awarded to a specific user address for creating the prediction market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
params._user: The specific user address for which this function is called.

returns.reward: Returns the reward amount that has been awarded to a specific user address for creating the prediction market.

getUserSettlementReward(uint256,address).details: Gets the reward amount that has been awarded to a specific user address for settling the prediction market.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
params._user: The specific user address for which this function is called.

returns.reward: Returns the reward amount that has been awarded to a specific user address for settling the prediction market.

getWinningOption(uint256).details: Gets the winning option after prediction market settlement.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

returns.winner: Returns the winning option, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish.

pauseMarketCreation().details: Updates the flag to pause market creation, in case of issues.

placeBet(uint8).details: Places a bet amount on a specific bet option in the prediction market that is currently Live.

params._option: The specific bet option for which this function is called, i.e. Bullish, Neutral, or Bearish.

resumeMarketCreation().details: Updates the flag to resume market creation, when issues are solved.

settleMarket().details: Settles the prediction market that is currently InSettlement, by calling the configured pricefeed oracle and incentivising the user address address for calling this function.

updateOracleAddress(address).details: Updates the address of the pricefeed oracle (e.g. the ChainLink ETH/USD pricefeed oracle).

params._oracle: The new address of the pricefeed oracle.

withdrawCreationReward(uint256).details: Allows the calling user address to withdraw his/her creation reward in the prediction market, after settlement.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

withdrawSettlementReward(uint256).details: Allows the calling user address to withdraw his/her settlement reward in the prediction market, after settlement.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.

withdrawWinnings(uint256).details: Allows the calling user address to withdraw his/her winnings in the prediction market, after settlement.

params._marketId: The id of the prediction market instance on which this function is called.
